text: Albert Benjamin Lewis (October 16, 1925 â€“ August 7, 2021) was an American lawyer, accountant and politician. Lewis was a Democratic member of the New York State Senate from 1967 to 1978. He was also the State Superintendent of Insurance from 1978 until 1983.Newly Confirmed Insurance Chief Has a Revised Car Inspection Plan in The New York Times on January 6, 1978 (subscription required) He was born in New York City. Lewis died on August 7, 2021 from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease in New York City at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Albert B. Lewis
